channel.title: Why pokemon?
channel.description:
Why is moparscape based around Pokemon? ;D here's some Pokemon links :D [url=http://www.pokemon.com/]http://www.pokemon.com/[/url] [img]http://anime-wallpapers.com/images/800x600/pokemon-allstars.jpg[/img]
say which is your favorite mine is on row 5 the seal :D :D! oh and.. "gotta catch em all"?!!??! there's so many!
[img]http://anime-wallpapers.com/images/800x600/pokemon.jpg[/img]
omg i forgot pikachu here's a pic [img]http://pikachuandpals.files.wordpress.com/2008/07/pikachu.jpg[/img]

ahahaha I laughed irl :D[/quote]

It’s original and simple, why not pokemon?

item.title: Why pokemon?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I have heaps of favorites.

I will write some that I like out for you guys :o

Alakazam, Altaria, Articuno, Arceus, Blastoise, Beautifly, Ambipom, Blaziken, Bulbasaur, Buizel, Charizard, Buneary, Burmy, Espeon, Exeggutor, Garchomp, Gible, Glaceon, Hpyno, Grumpig, Heracross, Jumpluff, Ho-Oh, Illumise, Lugia, Leafeon, Latios, Latias, Nincada, Onix, Pachirisu, Pidgey, Paras, Ratatta, Roserade, Roselia, Salamance, Sceptile, Shuckle, Skitty, Snorlax, Munchlax, Spinarak, Charmander, Staryu, Starmie, Swampert, Swellow, Tailow, Tropius, Venusaur, Venonat, Vileplume, Wartortle, Wurmple, Weedle, Volbeat, Zapdos, Zigzagoon, Mew, Mewtwo, Mr. Mime, Gardevoir, Ralts, Geodude, Dragonite, Eevee, Caterpie, Cherrim, Buizel, Ampharos, Cyndaquil, Lotad, Marchoke, Marchomp, Dratini, Luvdisc, Tyranitar, Moltress, Banette, Torchic, Treecko, Baltoy, Starly, Staraptor, Steelix, Magmortar, Kakuna, Typhlosion, Vaporeon, Flareon, Jolteon, Leafeon, Flygon, Stantler, Houndoom, Seviper, Nidoran, Magnemite, Magnezone, Luxray, Sableye, Teddiursa, Grimer, Skoripi, Skarmory, Tyrogue, Magby, Suicune, Seedot, Cacnea, Entei, Raikou, Sandrew, Sandslash, Girafferig (?), Belossom, Carvanha, Meowth, Kyogre, Groudon, Rayquaza, Togepi, Pikachu, Mudkip, Squirtle, Togetic, Ariados, Beedrill, Golem, Graveler, Spoink, Hitmonlee, Hitmonchan, Clamperl, Tangela, Growlithe, Missingno, Ganger, Ghastly, Grovyle, Minun, Plusle, Ditto, Drowzey, Diglet, Dugtrio, Pichu, Raichu, Silcoon, Manaphy, Bagon, Xatu, Sudowoodo, Electrike, Camerupt, Numel, Parasect, Umbreon, Weezing, Koffing, Charmeleon, Ivysaur, Aggron, Voltorb, Electrode, Rapidash, Porygon, Porygon 2, Magikarp, Machop.
